taskDescription:
How many ways are there to choose a hand of 6 cards from a standard deck with the constraint that 3 are <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♠<!-- ♠ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\spadesuit</annotation></semantics></math>, 2 are <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♡<!-- ♡ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\heartsuit</annotation></semantics></math>, and 1 is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi mathvariant="normal">♣<!-- ♣ --></mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\clubsuit</annotation></semantics></math>?
